title: From Orphan to Engineer
story: Samir joined our program at age 9 after losing both parents. With the support of generous donors, he completed his education and recently graduated as a civil engineer. He now gives back by mentoring other orphans in our program.

title: A Teacher's Journey
story: Mariam's dream was always to become a teacher. Through our education sponsorship program, she completed her Bachelor of Education degree and now teaches at a local school, inspiring the next generation.
outcome: Working as a primary school teacher
